name.br: Pergaminho de Experiência do Grupo (1 dia)
name.jp: パーティー経験値戦神の巻物(1日)
name.sp: 1 Día Pergamino de Exp de Party
name.th: 1 วัน Scroll of Party Exp

description.en: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.ar: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.br: Aumenta a taxa de ganho de Experiência para o Grupo em 50% quando é ativado pelo líder. (Dura 1 dia a partir da ativação, mesmo quando desconectado)
description.cns: 剧团长使用时，所有剧团成员杀怪获得的剧团经验值提升50%。（持续1天，离线计时）
description.de: Die Party erhält 50% mehr Party EXP (Nur wenn der Partyleader es anwendet. Hält 1 Tag)
description.fi: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.fil: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.fr: L'expérience du groupe est augmentée de 50% lorsque le chef du groupe active ce parchemin. (Dure 24 heures à partir de l'activation, même si vous êtes déconnecté)
description.id: Meningkatkan tingkat di mana Party Exp diperoleh sebesar 50%, ketika pemimpin party mengaktifkannya. (Berlangsung 1 hari sejak aktivasi, bahkan jika log off)
description.it: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.jp: パーティーリーダーが使用する際に、全てのパーティーメンバーの狩りで得るパーティー経験値が50％アップします。（ログアウト時もカウント）
description.kr: 극단장이 사용 시, 모든 극단원의 사냥으로 얻는 극단 경험치가 50% 상승 합니다. 극단장이 활성화해야 작용합니다. (로그아웃해도, 1일 동안 작동합니다)
description.nl: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.pl: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.ru: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.sp: Aumenta la tasa de Exp de Party ganada en 50%, cuando el líder de party lo tiene activo. (Dura 1 día desde la activación, incluso si estás desconectado)
description.sw: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 1 day from activation, even if logged off)
description.th: เพิ่มอัตราการได้รับ Exp ปาร์ตี้ 50% เมื่อหัวหน้าปาร์ตี้เปิดใช้งาน (ใช้ได้ 1 วันนับจากเปิดใช้งาน แม้ว่าจะออกจากระบบแล้วก็ตาม)
description.tw: 團長使用時，所有劇團成員狩獵所獲得的劇團經驗值會提升50%。（持續1天，即使登出也會持續計算）
description.vi: Tăng tỷ lệ nhận được Exp Party lên 50%, khi người đứng đầu nhóm kích hoạt nó. (Kéo dài 1 ngày kể từ khi kích hoạt, ngay cả khi đã đăng xuất)
